Knowledge of Agile (Scrum) software development methodologies     Able to work well in a team framework, and motivated to take on challenges individually.     Develop web applications, web services utilizing .Net 3.5/4.0/4.6 technologies (using C#) and JavaScript     Participate in database designs, including writing stored procedures, etc., using a modern Relational DB (e.g. Microsoft SQL Server 2008 and above)     Experience developing with Amazon Web Services
